global_property.property_value: <org.openmrs.layout.name.NameTemplate> <codeName>customXmlTemplate</codeName> <displayName>Custom Name Format</displayName> <nameMappings class="properties"> <property name="prefix" value="PersonName.prefix"/> <property name="givenName" value="PersonName.givenName"/> <property name="familyName" value="PersonName.familyName"/> </nameMappings> <sizeMappings class="properties"> <property name="prefix" value="5"/> <property name="givenName" value="30"/> <property name="familyName" value="25"/> </sizeMappings> <lineByLineFormat> <string>prefix</string> <string>givenName</string> <string>familyName</string> </lineByLineFormat> <requiredElements> <string>givenName</string> <string>familyName</string> </requiredElements> </org.openmrs.layout.name.NameTemplate>
